name: HowILearnedToLoveTheBugs
description:
I just wanted to make a normal Top-Down-Shooter. Those are always a great idea 

and they can fit literally any given theme. However, things have clearly gotten out of 

hand. It appears I somehow managed to attach the PlayerMovementScript to the 

entire level instead of the Player ( WASD or Arrow-keys) 

I also did a little Oopsie in the GunScript ( LeftMouseButton for the SubMachine Gun 

and RightMouseButton for the RocketLauncher )
